title: Your car will park itself sooner than you think
content:
Let’s face it: parking sucks. From endlessly searching for a spot during peak traffic times, to performing surgeon-esque maneuvers in order to fit into a tight space, it’s always a nightmare. My dream is a world where my car will drop me off, park itself, and then pick me up whenever I want. “Come down to Earth, Ioanna,” you might say, “it’ll never happen.” But you’d be wrong. Because my dream is coming true as we speak.  The technology is known as automated valet parking (AVP) — and it doesn’t even need full self-driving functionality. A modern vehicle equipped with…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: How close are we really to having our cars park themselves?
